recipesJson.name: Mango Orange Pineapple
recipesJson.author: ruinate
recipesJson.description: Chill, summery fruit blend.  Really well balanced imo.  Tastes like mango orange pineapple single flavor.  Pure shake and vape.

reviews.text: The flavors blend really well! Thanks for sharing.

Off a shake it's great! I can taste mostly the mango right now and the orange on the back end. The pineapple brightens the whole recipe. I really like this. I don't like coolants, so I left out the WS-23. I'll have to try it again after it steeps for a day or two. Thanks!  After a few days of steeping the flavors all blend into an amazing tasty mix!  Update 5/30- This turned out to be one of my favorite fruit recipes!
